New Records: Ja Morant recorded his 60th career point-assist double-double, tying the Memphis Grizzlies franchise record held by Mike Conley.
Key Match Events: Ja Morant played 25 minutes despite being listed as questionable with right thigh soreness.
Morant scored 16 points and made 10 assists in the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Memphis Grizzlies improved to 2-1 on the NBA season with their win over the Orlando Magic.
Ja Morant's achievement took him just 260 career games to tie Mike Conley's record.
